text: [Fir'avn] Guft: «Ojo pes az on ki ʙa sumo icozat diham ʙa u imon ovarded? Hatman, u ʙuzurgi sumost, ki ʙa sumo codugari omuxtaast. Pas, hatman, dastu poji sumoro ʙar aksi jakdigar [az capu rost] qat' mekunam va hamagiatonro dar tanahoi naxl ʙa dor meovezam va on goh xuʙ xohed donist, ki azoʙ [va sikancai] kadom jaki az mo saxttar va pojandatar ast; [man jo Parvardigori Muso]»
